QuestData.Title: Spinal Dust
QuestData.Description: The dark energy that flows through the bodies of reanimated skeletons tends to accumulate primarily in their spine. I've discovered a method of instilling this energy into a potion that boosts our magical abilities against the undead.$B$BBring me some spinal dust and I'll be glad to provide you with a sample. You'll find an ample number of skeletons wandering the Dead Scar, west of here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring back 10 Spinal Dusts to Magistrix Aminel in Tranquillien.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have the samples I requested, $N?
QuestData.RewardText: Take this, $N. You'll feel the difference immediately!$B$BFeel free to bring more spinal dust; I can use as much of it as you can provide. Side effects? You might start feeling your joints acting up a bit. Nothing permanent, I assure you!
